translation.en: [narrator] A long, long time ago, a kingdom lived in peace…
believing they had nothing to fear.
was a great and terrible evil.

translation.ko: 그 괴물은 경고도 없이 공격해 왔고

translation.en: laying waste to everything and everyone in its path.
But in that darkest hour, a hero rose up.
translation.ko: 하지만 암울하던 그때 한 영웅이 출현했죠

translation.en: [Gloreth] Go back to the shadows from whence you came!
[narrator] Gloreth vowed that her people would never be vulnerable again.
So she trained an elite force of knights and decreed that their descendants
would protect the kingdom for generations to come.
But if you want a happily ever after,
you can never let your guard down
because the monsters are always out there.
We are coming to you live from the Glorodome.
[Nate] And tonight's the night we knight the knights!
-Ain't that right, Pam? -It sure is, Nate.
But this is also the most controversial knighting ceremony in a thousand years.
You can feel the excitement and the tension.
-[child] Come on! It's starting! -Tonight, tradition will be cast aside,
translation.ko: 시작한다! 바로 오늘 밤 전통이 사라지고

translation.en: and the kingdom will change forever because of one man.
translation.ko: 한 사람으로 인해 왕국이 영원히 바뀝니다

translation.en: The street kid with the impossible dream of being a knight.
translation.ko: 기사가 되려는 불가능한 꿈을 가진 아이

translation.en: I'm here to slay monsters and protect our kingdom!
until the queen herself made a shocking decision.
No, he doesn't come from a noble bloodline…
…but he might just have the heart of a hero.
[Alamzapam] And Ballister made the most of that chance,
graduating top of his institute class.
A class that includes none other than…
and the most anticipated knight of a generation.
[Alamzapam] With Ballister joining the ranks, for the first time in history,
our safety will be put in the hands of a commoner.
Ugh. I really hope the queen knows what she's doing.
So tonight, only one question remains.
Will the kingdom accept this knight who might not be right?
translation.ko: 왕국은 부적격일지 모르는 기사를 받아들일 것인가?

translation.en: Will the kingdom accept this knight who might not be right?
Aaand will Ballister be broody on the biggest day of his life?
I'm not brooding. I'm just-- I'm thinking. This is my thinking face.
translation.ko: 울상이 아니라 생각 중인 거야 생각하는 표정이야

translation.en: Hey, Thinky Face. Look at me.
You were better and worked harder than all of us.
translation.ko: 넌 우리 중에 최고고 가장 노력했어

translation.en: You're gonna be a knight, Bal.
But what if they still hate me?
No one hates a hero of the realm.
the knighting ceremony is just moments away.
Your sword, and don't touch the cart.
I just wanted to say, I know I've always been tough on you,
and I never thought you belonged here…
Did you think I was gonna keep going,
or did you think I was gonna apologize for how I treated you?
translation.ko: 내가 사과라도 할 줄 안 거야?

translation.en: You're so stupid. I love it. It's so funny.
Ballister thought I was gonna apologize for treating him like the trash he is!
translation.ko: 발리스터가 내가 자기한테 사과할 줄 알았대

translation.en: come take a picture with the real knight, not some charity case.
translation.ko: 진짜 기사랑 찍어 불우이웃 특채 말고

translation.en: -Smack that hard. Slap it! -Can I just--
There is no greater calling than protecting this kingdom from evil.
never weaken, and always be the will of Gloreth.
Ballister, today the kingdom will see you for who you really are.
translation.ko: 발리스터, 오늘 왕국은 네 진면목을 볼 거다

translation.en: Wait, what do you mean? You think I'm her favorite?
[Ceremony MC] And now the newest heroes of the realm!
My lords and ladies, Her Majesty the Queen.
I hereby pronounce you Sir Ambrosius Goldenloin,
I've been looking forward to this moment.
any of you should be able to hold the sword -if you want it. -Huh?
translation.ko: 원하는 자는 이 검을 들어도 좋다

translation.en: I've watched this young man earn it many times over.
translation.ko: 이 청년은 몇 번이고 그 자격을 얻었다

translation.en: I hereby pronounce you Sir Ballister Boldheart,
Let a new era of heroes begin with you.
[man] Arrest him! He killed the queen!
-[man 2] Let's get him! -[woman] Yeah, he killed the queen!
[narrator] Some of us don't get the happily ever after we're looking for…
…'cause it ain't that kind of kingdom.
And this ain't that kind of story.
[Nate] The queen killer is still out there.
Not since Gloreth's monster has anything been so hated.
translation.ko: 글로레스의 괴물 버금가는 증오의 대상이 됐죠

translation.en: -He never should've been a knight. -He wasn't one of us and hated us for it.
-He's got no place in this kingdom. -He's a murderer.
♪ I'm a grrrl just like, like, like, like Like, like, like, like, like ♪ ♪ I'm a grrrl just like, like, like, like Like, like, like, like, like ♪
♪ I'm a grrrl just like, like, like, like Like, like, like, like, like ♪
The garbage and the smell of sadness pull the whole thing together.
translation.ko: 쓰레기와 슬픔의 냄새가 아주 잘 어울려

translation.en: -And how did you-- -Whoa! Yeah! Sick arm.
-Did they let you keep the old one? -No. Let go!
-Ooh! Can I have it? -What? Put that down.
That is not for little girls.
Okay, how old do you think I am?
-Help me out. More or less than ten? -Not a lot of kids in your life, huh?
translation.ko: - 적어? 더 많아? - 애들 안 겪어 봤지?

translation.en: You know what? No. I'd like it to stay that way. You have to go.
But I'm here about the job.
It's all here in my application.
This is just a bunch of drawings. Very disturbing drawings.
translation.ko: 그림만 잔뜩 있잖아 되게 불편한 그림이네

translation.en: On a rhinoceros, skewering several guards like a human kebab.
translation.ko: 코뿔소 타고 있네 경비병들을 케밥처럼 꿰어버렸잖아

translation.en: I thought a visual aid would really make my resume pop.
To help you do whatever it takes
to get revenge on the cruel world that rejected you.
Shall we pillage a village? Lay low until they don't remember you.
Then we rise like a fiery phoenix from the ashes
The point is, whatever your dark heart desires, boss.
-I don't need a side-- -Every villain needs a sidekick.
translation.ko: - 난 그런 거… - 악당은 조수가 필요해

translation.en: -Wait, I am not a-- -Whoa! Sweet murder wall!
-That's not-- -Who do you wanna kill first?
You're right. He is extremely punchable. No, wait. Look. That is not a murder wall.
translation.ko: 하긴 그렇긴 해 아니, 잠깐 살인 계획이 아니야

translation.en: Wait. Are you saying that you're not a villain?
No! No, I'm not a villain. No.
What? Are you disappointed that I'm not a murderer?
The real villain is still out there, and I do need help.
translation.ko: 진짜 악당이 있어 도움을 청해야 돼

translation.en: -Not from you. -Aw, fine! Then from who?
translation.ko: - 네 도움 말고 - 알았어! 그럼 누구?

translation.en: The guy who cut off your arm?
I am not gonna get arrested!
-Wanna get some lunch? -Yeah, I love lunch.
You had to take the arm, huh?
We all saw how it happened.
She thought someone like you could be a hero.
translation.ko: 너 같은 사람을 영웅이 될 거라 믿으시고

translation.en: And it cost her her life.
You know I love the queen. I love the Institute.
He is as heartbroken as the rest of this kingdom.
You won't be talking to anyone anymore, Ballister.
translation.ko: 넌 더는 누구하고도 얘기 못 할 거다

translation.en: No. I won't make that mistake again.
translation.ko: 아니, 같은 실수를 반복할 순 없지

translation.en: Did I know this was gonna happen?
Because once everyone sees you as a villain,
They only see you one way, no matter how hard you try.
translation.ko: 아무리 애를 써도 시선은 바뀌지 않아

translation.en: You gave it a good shot, though. I gotta hand it to you.
-I still gotta get you out of here. -Wait. How did you get out?
I know the code. Beep bop boop beep bop.
You could sit here for the rest of eternity,
slowly watching your muscles atrophy, your skin turning to rot,
translation.ko: 근육 슬슬 쪼그라들고 피부 썩어 가고

translation.en: your nails growing into long, curly-fry-looking talons.
translation.ko: 손톱이 회오리 감자처럼 자라는 거 보든가

translation.en: You know there's no toilet in there.
Hide. If you see anyone, hide.
Fine, because we're still gonna break stuff.
translation.ko: 좋아, 때려 부술 건 아직 있으니까

translation.en: This place should be crawling with guards.
How exactly did you get past…
They were like this when I got here.
The One-Arm Club's about to get some new members.
He is a murderer… of fun.
-Did you even have a plan? -This is the plan!
I break you out, chaos, destruction, something, something, something, we win.
The "old something, something, something, we win." Terrible plan.
Better than your plan of, "Sit in the dark and mope in a room with no toilet."
translation.ko: 변기 없는 방에서 청승 떠는 것보단 낫지

translation.en: Knights don't mope. We brood. I was brooding.
translation.ko: 기사는 청승 안 떨어 깊이 생각하던 거지

translation.en: Why don't we do it your way? Yeah?
Murder him, murder her, murder everyone!
-[knight] Open the door! -Not an exit. That's on me.
-[thump] -Did you see the way he looked at me?
He really thinks I killed the queen. -Everyone thinks you killed the queen. -[thump]
translation.ko: - 진짜 시해자로 생각하나 봐 - 모두가 그렇게 생각하지

translation.en: -Snap out of it. -What was that for?
I can get us out of here, but things are about to get weird.
translation.ko: 탈출할 순 있지만 좀 이상해질 거야

translation.en: -About to get weird? -Promise me you won't freak out.
How, if I don't know what's gonna happen?
-I guess you'll just have to trust me. -Why would I trust you?
translation.ko: - 그냥 날 믿어 - 뭘 보고 믿어?

translation.en: -If you don't, you'll die in this closet! -Die?
Wow. Even when you see the horn?
Horn? You mean like a trumpet?
I promise I will not freak-- Uh…
This is the part where you run.
No! Stay away! Get back! No! This is not happening!
translation.ko: 안 돼, 저리 가! 이건 꿈이야!

translation.en: -So, you're a girl and a rhino? -I'm a lot of things.
Right. You promised not to freak out.
Huh. This floor is surprisingly stable.
You. You did that on purpose.
You catch on quick, boss. Yeah.
No. We've gotta get out of here.
translation.ko: 안 돼, 안 돼 빨리 빠져나가자

translation.en: No! No! No! No going down! No going down!
-Ah. Hey, boss! -♪ Do you forget, forget the basics? ♪
How long was I out for?
Don't be so gullible. It was just a couple of hours.
Wait. Wait. Last thing I remember, we were in a supply closet.
And now… How did I get here?
I dragged you for, like, seven miles.
Your head bounced on the sidewalk a few times.
Really? You thanked me, said you'd forever be in my debt,
and that we'd always be best friends.
Hey, I spruced up the lair.
I arranged the weapons in order of deadliness,
unchildproofed the place, opened the poisons laying around,
translation.ko: 아동 안전장치 해제 독병은 열어서 늘어놨고

translation.en: and pulled some rusty nails one centimeter out of the floorboards.
Overall, just made it much more evil lair-y in here.
[gasps] Evil Larry. That's a great villain name.
-You should change your name. -Never gonna happen.
translation.ko: '아주써글' 이름 죽인다 악당 이름으로 바꿔 절대 안 돼

translation.en: And I updated your murder wall.
Plus, I drew up plans for revenge, torment,
translation.ko: 그리고 복수와 고문과 일반적인 나쁜 짓들도

translation.en: You look freaked. You promised you'd hold it together.
translation.ko: 또 저 표정이야 안 놀라기로 했잖아

translation.en: No. No, no, no. Of course not.
You're obviously not a massive fire-breathing, you know--
But you do do the shifty-shift-shifting-shape thing.
And you're a girl who can turn into--
People don't just turn into things.
Okay. Fine. Then I have a million questions.
The squire has to know something.
translation.ko: 분명 그 종자가 뭔가 알 거야

translation.en: He's the one that gave me the sword. The sword that…
translation.ko: 그 녀석이 준 검이고 그 검은…

translation.en: Then let's go kill-- Get him.
The thing you do? It's too much. No.
I think you're trying to say, "Thanks for saving my life."
Three times, if you're keeping score.
But you're right. I'm sure you can do this alone,
translation.ko: 근데 괜찮아 너 혼자 가도 돼

translation.en: with every knight in the entire kingdom gunning for you. Good luck.
translation.ko: 기사들이 떼로 몰려와도 알아서 잘하겠지 행운을 빌어

translation.en: Here's the thing. When we clear your name, then I am your official sidekick forever.
translation.ko: 근데 누명 벗고 나면 조수 시켜주기야

translation.en: -I'm not sure I'm comfortable with that. -Don't overthink it.
translation.ko: - 난 좀 불편한데 - 깊이 생각 말고

translation.en: Can you just be you, please?
Hey. You ever put your head in the mouth of one of these?
translation.ko: 혹시 상어 입에 머리 넣어 봤어?

translation.en: Oh man! Look at this place!
A thousand years of history destroyed.
Your uncle's head fell on my grandma's butt.
translation.ko: 너네 삼촌 머리가 우리 할머니 엉덩이에 꼈어

translation.en: [knight 3] Well, if Goldenloin hadn't helped him…
-[knight 4] I never liked… -Let me get this straight.
The murderer of the queen escaped
with the help of a girl, an ostrich, and a whale?
Why didn't you tell us Ballister was working with whales?
translation.ko: 발리스터가 고래들과 한패란 거 왜 숨겼지?

translation.en: Oh, what? Whale? Really? Yeah. You knew him better than anyone, bro.
translation.ko: 이제 와서 시치미야? 네가 제일 가까웠잖아

translation.en: I tried to stop him, bro.
Really? Like this? "Oh, hi, Ballister. Come right in."
"And of course you can bring your whale, ostrich, and big fat unicorn."
-One with the horn that broke everything. -You mean rhinoceros?
translation.ko: - 그 뿔에 다 박살 났어 - 코뿔소 얘기야?

translation.en: If I meant rhinoperos, I would have said rhinoperos.
There is a villain on the loose in our kingdom.
Look at you, acting like common children.
We are born to protect this kingdom.
translation.ko: 우린 이 왕국을 지키기 위해 태어났다

translation.en: Let me take the lead, Director.
There's only two things I want right now. A, to have a really big sword.
translation.ko: 제가 원하는 건 두 가지뿐입니다 하나, 커다란 검

translation.en: And three, to treat Ballister like the queen-killing monster he is.
translation.ko: 셋, 발리스터를 국왕을 시해한 괴물로 대할 것

translation.en: I'll make it hurt. I'll make--
This is the greatest threat we've faced in generations.
Thankfully, we have a descendant of Gloreth to lead us.
translation.ko: 다행히 우릴 이끌어 줄 글로레스의 후손이 있다

translation.en: Find Ballister, and bring him to me.
[Nate] After yesterday's vicious attack on the Institute,
our knights have redoubled their efforts
in the manhunt for the villain Ballister.
We just have to get to the market and find the squire without drawing att--
Counterpoint. Your plan sucks, and it's boring.
-Where's the drama? The screams of terror? -[mouse squeaks]
No. We're doing things my way this time. No one gets hurt.
translation.ko: 이번엔 내 식대로 해 다치는 사람 없게

translation.en: I was going for the "hurting people" version.
-We find the squire and question him. -Then hurt him.
translation.ko: - 종자를 찾아서 묻기만 해 - 그리고 때려야지

translation.en: -No. And then find the proof. -By hurting him.
No. Can we just get to the market, please?
translation.ko: 아니야, 그냥 시장으로 가면 안 돼?

translation.en: -Next flight leaves in three… -No. What are you doing?
-…two… -No-- Boo! I'm a ghost. Heh heh heh.
Eh, sorry. I can't be seen with that! Aah!
Oh, unclench your mustache. What's the worst that could happen?
In light of yesterday's horrific attack on the Institute,
we are taking every precaution to keep you safe.
translation.ko: 여러분의 안전을 위한 대책을 강구 중입니다

translation.en: Please do not be alarmed. This is only a test.
Go about your normal lives and rest assured
that the Institute has this situation well in hand.
Good day and may Gloreth guide you always.
Do not be alarmed. Please remain calm.
The second we let our guard down, something terrible comes over that wall.
translation.ko: 방심하면 끔찍한 게 저 벽을 넘어온다고

translation.en: Have you ever even been outside the wall?
translation.ko: 저 벽 너머로 가 보기는 했어?

translation.en: Yeah, 'cause I have a death wish. No! No one has!
translation.ko: 응, 죽는 게 소원이거든 아무도 못 가 봤지!

translation.en: You know what? We're going underground. Without the wings.
translation.ko: 아무튼 눈에 띄지 마 날개도 치우고

translation.en: Die! Die! Die! Die! Die! Go back to the shadows and--
[automated announcer] Next train arriving in three minutes.
Remember, if you see something, slay something.
After the break, "First Family Fashion," what the nobles are wearing this season.
translation.ko: 잠시 후 이번 시즌 귀족 패션을 알아봅니다

translation.en: -Excuse me. I need to see your face. -Of course.
So then an otter comes around the corner, and it bit me.
A sea otter or a river otter?
Are you kidding? Does it matter? It bit me.
There's significant anatomical differences between the two.
We're never gonna make it on that train without them seeing us.
Who has four thumbs and is great at distractions?
If you see something, slay something!
Yaah! I'm evil, and I hate everybody!
Not as much as I hate myself. Can somebody give me a hug?
translation.ko: 내가 가장 싫지만 누가 좀 안아 줄래?
누가 좀 안아 줄래? 웃음이 싫다!

translation.en: And I think babies are ugly!
Look at this! I'm loitering, and I'm littering.
I hope you all like freestyle jazz.
I'm not pushing! I'm encouraging you forward!
What was that? And you never said you could turn into me.
translation.ko: 나로 변신되는 건 말 안 했잖아

translation.en: By the way, I can turn into you.
Well, for the record, that is nothing like me.
You're right. You're never that much fun.
All right, let's go. Let's get this gutter punk.
That's him. Where's that train headed?
That's the express to the market. Arrives in six minutes.
And we'll be there to meet him.
"Everyone to the market. I'm a dork, and my hair smells like lavender."
Then slay your hunger with Dragon Krisps!
[announcer] Dragon Krisps. Part of your heroic breakfast!
Can you please just be normal for a second?
I just think it'd be easier if you were a girl.
Easier to be a girl? You're hilarious.
translation.ko: 여자가 되는 게 편해? 웃기고 있네

translation.en: I mean, easier if you look human.
For you. A lot of people aren't as accepting as me.
translation.ko: 너한테 나처럼 못 받아들이는 사람도 많아

translation.en: How did you get like this?
No, how do you-- I'm just trying to understand what I'm working with here.
translation.ko: 아니, 어떻게… 내가 뭐랑 일하는지 알긴 해야지

translation.en: You deserve a better explanation than that.
I was playing in the woods,
following the birds flying and the fish swimming
They all looked so happy together,
-That's when I heard it… -[woman vocalizing softly] …a song, calling me,
translation.ko: 그때 날 부르는 노랫소릴 듣고 가보니

translation.en: -leading me to a wishing well. -[song continues]
[Ballister] How did you know it wasn't just a regular well?
translation.ko: 소원 비는 우물? 그걸 그냥 보고 알아?

translation.en: -Do you wanna tell my story for me? -Right. Sorry. Go on.
translation.ko: - 얘기 안 들을 거야? - 미안, 계속해

translation.en: As I slowly approached the well,
a coin appeared in the palm of my hand as if by magic.
translation.ko: 내 손에 동전 하나가 마법처럼 나타났어

translation.en: And I knew what I had to do.
I summoned my courage, held the coin tight,
translation.ko: 난 용기를 짜내서 동전을 꼭 쥐고

translation.en: threw it into the well, and made a wish.
A wish to one day be trapped on a subway
with an uptight knight asking me small-minded questions.
Do you still have that pizza?
[automated announcer] Now arriving at Market Station.
Do you think he saw us?
What in the name of Gloreth?
Did Goldenloin see you do the thing?
translation.ko: 너 그거 했던 거 골든로인이 봤나?

translation.en: Seriously? That guy cut off your arm, and you're worried about being seen with me.
translation.ko: 네 팔 자른 사람인데 나랑 있는 거 들키는 게 걱정돼?

translation.en: Okay. We've gotta get him out of here quietly.
Wait, not like that. Not like that, either.
translation.ko: 잠깐, 그렇게 말고 그것도 안 돼

translation.en: You want me to shift. You don't want me to shift. Pick a lane.
[Goldenloin] I know he's here! Find him!
-[woman] Look, it's Goldenloin! -[man] I can't believe it.
-Please move aside. -Can I get your autograph?
-Just one signature. Who am I signing? -Do you sign skin?
'Cause if you do, you're gonna miss out on a great deal today!
[cute voice] Excuse me, Mr. Squire, sir.
She went to that scary alley over there.
Can you help me find her?
Let me go ahead and pass this problem on to someone else.
This baby's fully loaded. State-of-the-art sound system.
There. Can we just part the waters?
Please help me. Help me, please.
A little demon baby is after me. Please help me. -[growls] -Aah!
With our 360-degree dashcams, you'll always see what's coming.
And our news feature will keep you up to date with the kingdom's headlines.
translation.ko: 그리고 최신 뉴스도 보실 수 있어요 "도주 중인 2인조"

translation.en: -Uh, you look a lot like-- -I'm innocent!
-There! -Excuse me. I need to get through. Move!
-Aw. Why did you get to kill him? -He's not dead. I hope.
translation.ko: - 나는 죽이지 말라더니 - 안 죽었을 거야

translation.en: -[man] Is that Ballister? -[woman] It's the queen killer!
-He's working with a demon baby! -I thought he ate babies!
translation.ko: - 꼬마 악마랑 한패잖아! - 애를 잡아먹지 않아?

translation.en: I hate to say it, but you make a pretty good bad guy.
translation.ko: 이런 말 하기 싫지만 너 완전 악당 같더라

translation.en: We're gonna shake this dude down in this sketchy part of town.
Look, let's just question the squire and get out-- Your leg.
-Oh. -Okay, you really need to sit down.
-No, it's fine. It's totally-- -Look at you. You're not fine.
-It's a splinter. It'll work itself out. -You're bleeding. Sit.
translation.ko: - 가시 박힌 정도야 - 피 나잖아, 앉아

translation.en: We're just gonna take a look, okay?
Uh, everything's fine. We're just gonna…
We're gonna do this on three.
Okay, most people scream at that part.
Pretty stabby in my leg region.
Does it hurt, or does it--
I feel worse when I don't do it.
You know that second right before you sneeze?
Then I shape-shift, and I'm free.
What if you held it in?
Don't be so gullible. I wouldn't die die.
I just sure wouldn't be living.
[Squire] So nice to hear you guys bonding.
translation.ko: 두 분 우정 얘기가 참 멋지네요

translation.en: Ah, it's such a shame I have to go. Let me go.
Oh yeah, the punk in the trunk. Let's go dunk on the punk in the trunk.
translation.ko: 맞다, 저 애송이 눈탱이를 밤탱이로 만들어 줘야지

translation.en: What I want is answers, so start talking.
No! Why did you set me up?
Of course. Todd swapped my sword, didn't he?
Guess we're just gonna have to do things the hard way.
Hard way? Hold on a second. Wait. Just wait.
Check it out. I'm in the locker room,
and you are looking at history in the making.
translation.ko: 여러분은 역사적인 순간을 보고 있는 거예요

translation.en: It's saying, "Respect me. Protect me. Put me on. No one's watching."
translation.ko: '날 존중해줘, 지켜줘 입어줘, 아무도 안 봐'

translation.en: Okay, this is the part you have to see.
I, I didn't know what to do. I tried to show you before…
Look, boss, you got betrayed by someone you trusted.
I get it. It sucks. But we did it. You're innocent, and we have the proof.
translation.ko: 그거 짜증 나지 그래도 해냈잖아 결백하단 증거를 찾았어

translation.en: What? Everybody needs to know the truth.
The system is jacked. The Institute needs to shut down.
Prospective target. Clear on Avenue Three. Over.
I will not be quiet about this.
This video could damage people's faith in the Institute.
Look, I don't know why she framed me, but the Institute's not the problem.
That's why I'm taking this to Ambrosius.
This is the man who cut off your arm. Arm-chopping is not a love language!
translation.ko: 네 팔까지 잘랐잖아 그게 널 아끼는 거야?

translation.en: He didn't cut off my arm. He disarmed a weapon.
translation.ko: 팔 자른 게 아니라 무장 해제시킨 거야

translation.en: You think this stops with the Director?
You should be questioning everything right now.
The will of Gloreth, the Institute, the wall.
You mean from villains like you?
Look, if we get this to Ambrosius, everything is gonna be okay.
Okay, fine. But when things go south, I'm breaking stuff.
translation.ko: 좋아, 알았어 근데 일이 틀어지면 다 때려 부술 거야

translation.en: Is something on your mind, Ambrosius?
The man I love, my best friend.
Although now he's got a new best friend. What's that about?
translation.ko: 이젠 절친이 생겼던데 무슨 일인 거지?

translation.en: What else is he hiding? Who is the real him?
translation.ko: 또 뭘 숨기는 거지? 진짜 모습은 뭐죠?

translation.en: A direct descendant of Gloreth? I never asked for that.
translation.ko: 글로레스의 직계 자손? 제가 바란 적도 없어요

translation.en: Now everyone expects me to arrest Ballister.
If I don't, I'm a traitor to you. If I do, I'm a traitor to him.
translation.ko: 안 하면 단장님을 배신 하면 그 친구를 배신!

translation.en: Oh, and on top of that, I chopped off his arm!
His arm! Who chops off an arm?
Because I was trained to? Arm chopping is not a love langua--
The blood of Gloreth runs through your veins.
They were like this when I got here.
Ambrosius, the Director killed the queen.
[laughing] Says the miscreant, whispering in his ear.
I'm innocent, and I have proof.
It doesn't matter. You shouldn't need proof.
You know I'm not a murderer.
What are you waiting for, Captain?
[Todd] Hurry before the whale gets here.
Ambrosius, I am begging you to trust me.
You wanna know who the kid is?
Oh, I like where this is going.
-Give me a sword. -We need to get you to safety.
-Aah! -Get this thing in the air now!
-You see a way out of here? -Of horse I do.
-We're going over, aren't we? -Yep! The only way out is down.
Ha ha! Told you you'd want the wings. Whoo-hoo!
-Okay, that was super gross. -Ha ha, I know!
Well, if it isn't the golden boy.
-That's the otter that bit me! -I can see your confusion.
It has the tail of a river otter, but the webbed back feet--
Did I ever mean anything to you? Or was it all just a lie?
A lie? Says the guy running around with a monster!
Don't call her that! She's smart, kind, and quite sophisticated.
translation.ko: 그렇게 부르지 마! 똑똑하고 다정하고 교양 있는 애야!

translation.en: That guy just peed his armor! He peed his armor!
And she has my back, unlike you.
translation.ko: 그리고 너랑 다르게 내 힘이 돼 줬어

translation.en: You lied to me about everything!
Only one lying to you is the Director!
What? You're gonna kill me now too?
Then you never knew me at all.
translation.ko: 그럼 넌 나를 하나도 모르는 거야

translation.en: Yeah. Now I'm gonna punch you in the face.
Now, I'm no doctor, but this cast looks delicious.
translation.ko: 내가 의사는 아니지만 깁스 맛있어 보이네

translation.en: Wait till you see what we do to your pet monster.
translation.ko: 애완 괴물 올 때까지 당해 봐라

translation.en: -Are you okay? -I don't wanna talk about it.
-I know something's wrong. -I said I don't wanna talk about it!
Hey, I'm just trying to help.
Did you see the way that little girl looked at me?
translation.ko: 그 여자애가 날 보던 눈빛 봤어?

translation.en: They grow up believing that they can be a hero
translation.ko: 자기랑 다른 존재의 심장에 검을 꽂으면

translation.en: if they drive a sword into the heart of anything different.
translation.ko: 영웅이 될 수 있다고 믿으며 자라지

translation.en: The fact that everyone in this kingdom wants to run a sword through my heart…
translation.ko: 왕국의 모두가 날 죽이려 한다는 거?

translation.en: We have to get you out of here.
We won't stop until we find someplace safe.
translation.ko: 안전한 곳을 찾을 때까지 가는 거야

translation.en: Listen, you were right about everything. The Institute, the wall…
translation.ko: 네 말이 다 맞았어 기사단, 장벽…

translation.en: No matter what we do, we can't change the way people see us.
You changed the way you see me.
We can't let the Director get away with this.
And you made a deal, right?
We clear your name, you make me your sidekick.
translation.ko: 누명 벗고 나면 날 조수로 써준다고

translation.en: You can't back out on a deal because you believe in truth and honor
translation.ko: 약속은 못 물러 넌 진실이며 명예며

translation.en: and blah, blah, blah. All that stupid stuff.
Truth and honor aren't stupid, but all right.
[knight] Excuse me, but the Director isn't available right now.
He could've said anybody killed the queen, but he said you. Why you?
translation.ko: 하필 단장님을 시해자로 지목한 이유가 뭐죠?

translation.en: Sir Goldenloin, is your loyalty to this kingdom
or to a knight who consorts with a monster?
Ever since I was young, I've had the same nightmare.
I find a crack in the wall.
And the crack grows bigger and bigger
I begged the queen not to question the word of Gloreth.
translation.ko: 폐하께 글로레스의 말을 의심치 마시라 했어

translation.en: Not to question what's kept us safe for a thousand years.
translation.ko: 우릴 천 년이나 지켜준 말을 믿으시라고

translation.en: Allowing Ballister to hold the sword was the first crack in the wall.
translation.ko: 발리스터를 기사로 삼는 건 장벽의 첫 번째 틈이었어

translation.en: we have a monster in our kingdom.
Gloreth did whatever it took to keep the monsters out.
translation.ko: 글로레스는 수단방법을 가리지 않고 괴물을 물리쳤다

translation.en: I can't wait for the kingdom to see this.
Well, and my sidekick. Round of applause, ladies and gents.
Was my acting okay? I was a little worried my last "Ehh" was too over the top.
translation.ko: 내 연기 괜찮았어? 마지막이 좀… 오버했나 했거든

translation.en: If you're looking for feedback, it was a little dramatic.
You won't win any awards, but it was good.
I've never taken a class. Really? That's a surprise.
translation.ko: - 나 배운 적도 없어 - 진짜? 대단한데

translation.en: Not a one. Oh, don't forget your sword, boss.
translation.ko: 한 번도 없어 검 챙겨야지, 보스

translation.en: I don't fight for her anymore.
[singsong] You called me your sidekick. You called me…
Yes! Let's take that pooch for a walk.
translation.ko: 좋아! 우리 댕댕이 산책 좀 가자

translation.en: Ooh, landing you in the Enchanted Forest, which is my domain.
My Scottie dog will not pay your tyrannical toll.
translation.ko: 폭군의 강제 통행료는 절대로 낼 수 없다

translation.en: He rallies the oppressed woodland creatures and starts a rebellion.
[blows fanfare] Squirrels scale the castle walls!
Bears batter down the gates! Letting chaos ensue!
You didn't tell me you could breathe fire.
[chuckles] Metal. Best two out of three?
Seventy-five-- The whole kingdom is seeing this thing.
Well, I guess there's only one question left.
Still reeling from the monster attack, the kingdom is rocked
by new footage of the Director making a truly shocking confession.
translation.ko: 단장의 충격적인 자백으로 왕국이 술렁이고 있습니다

translation.en: I framed Ballister. I killed the queen.
I framed Ballister. I killed the queen.
♪ Is it ever gonna be enough? ♪
I framed Ballister. I killed the queen.
translation.ko: 내가 발리스터를 모함했다 국왕을 죽였지 "범죄를 시인한 단장"

translation.en: -♪ More and more, more and more ♪ -Give us the Director!
♪ Is it ever gonna be enough? ♪
♪ More and more, more and more ♪
You're under arrest for the murder of the queen and for--
[man on TV] Zombies are immortal, eternal beings. There's no way to kill them.
translation.ko: 좀비는 불사의 존재라 죽일 수 없지

translation.en: [woman on TV] But what if they come for us?
I can't believe I'm about to say this, but I actually feel bad for the zombies.
-That's a lot more than you've given me. -I'm here to save you.
translation.ko: - 넌 그것도 안 줬어 - 널 구하러 온 거야

translation.en: -You are so full of-- -Hey! Can I get you guys something?
Bal, I wouldn't be here if it wasn't important.
translation.ko: 중요한 일 아니면 안 왔을 거야

translation.en: And I wouldn't be here if you'd stood up for me.
translation.ko: 네가 내 편 들었으면 이럴 일도 없었어

translation.en: -We're done. So is she. -We now go live to the Institute.
-There is something I need to tell you. -[man] Hey, turn that up.
translation.ko: - 꼭 할 말 있어 - 소리 키워요

translation.en: Citizens of the realm, that is not me in the recording.
translation.ko: 왕국의 백성 여러분 영상 속 인물은 제가 아닙니다 "왕국에 대한 공격"

translation.en: I know it looks like me and sounds like me, but it is not me.
That was the monster working with the real queen killer, Ballister.
They are trying to trick you.
We are under attack by something that can take any form.
translation.ko: 우린 변신하는 존재의 공격을 받고 있습니다

translation.en: Your spouse, your child, your best friend,
the person sitting next to you.
so long as the villain and that monster are still out there.
Ambrosius, I'm not the villain here.
but together, we'll take her down and prove it to the kingdom.
Thank you. The Director can't get away--
Bal, I'm talking about your sidekick.
No, you're wrong. We've been wrong about everything.
translation.ko: 네가 잘못 안 거야 모두 잘못 알고 있었어

translation.en: Wrong about everything? Then explain this.
translation.ko: 모두 잘못 알아? 그럼 이거 설명해 봐

translation.en: This scroll has been in the Institute vaults for a thousand years.
translation.ko: 기사단 금고에 천 년간 보관됐던 문서야

translation.en: She's come back to finish what she started,
translation.ko: 자기가 시작한 일을 마무리하러 온 거야

translation.en: and she's using you to do it.
We can slay this monster. We can go back to the way things were.
-No, I can't do this. I'm done! -Listen to me!
translation.ko: - 안 돼, 난 못 해 - 들어 봐!

translation.en: She's using you to destroy the kingdom!
-Why won't you admit it? You're in danger! -Why can't you just leave me alone?
translation.ko: - 인정해, 넌 위험해 - 왜 날 가만 못 둬!

translation.en: Ohh. I have not slept like that in forever.
translation.ko: 이렇게 푹 잔 건 정말 오랜만이야

translation.en: Why do you have your cloak on?
Where did you get that? Who have you been talking--
You think that I would do that?
You're the one who told me not to trust anybody, question everything.
translation.ko: 네가 아무도 믿지 말고 모두 의심하라며

translation.en: That's right! Even now, with this,
think about everything we have been through together.
translation.ko: 우리가 함께 겪은 일들을 생각해 봐

translation.en: I'm thinking about everything we've done.
Broken out of jail, stolen cars, kidnapped people, manipulated people.
translation.ko: 탈옥하고 차 훔치고 사람 납치하고 이용하고

translation.en: You were using me! You wanted them to see a villain.
translation.ko: 날 이용하던 거지! 악당처럼 보이게 하려고

translation.en: Someone else to hate so you wouldn't be alone.
translation.ko: 외롭기 싫으니까 나도 미움받게 한 거야

translation.en: Because you're not a sidekick. You're a m--
No, I want to hear you say it.
-Stay back! -No! Stop! Stop! She's my friend!
Go back to the shadows from whence you came.
[woman] There is no place for you!
-[Ballister] Don't lie to me! -[whisper] She's a monster.
Don't you wish you were normal?
[Gloreth] Go back to the shadows from whence you came.
[Ballister] There's something wrong with you. What are you?
-[woman] Monster! -[Ballister] You know what you are!
You brought a monster into our home.
You should've stayed in the gutter where you belong.
I feel like the whole place kind of went like "wubba, wubba, wubba, wubba, wubba."
It's headed straight for the city. Alert the Institute.
If that thing destroys the kingdom, it's on you, bro.
translation.ko: 저게 왕국을 파괴하면 전부 네 탓이야

translation.en: Ma'am, incoming report from Sir Thodeus.
We need barricades on Avenue A through F.
And can we clear the streets? These people are in danger.
Sound the alarm! Sound the alarm! Hit it with everything we've got.
[Todd] Hey, Goldie. Watch how a real knight gets it done.
translation.ko: 골디, 진정한 기사의 활약을 잘 봐라

translation.en: Let's shoot some darts and break some hearts.
translation.ko: 다트 좀 던져서 재미 좀 보자

translation.en: I'm gonna be a freaking hero.
We need more firepower! This thing is gonna kill us all!
[automated voice running down] Monster attack. Monster attack. Monster attack. Monster attack.
[announcer] The game that lets you be a hero.
Keep them moving. Get everyone underground.
translation.ko: - 도와주세요! - 계속 이동시켜 - 전부 지하로 - 알겠습니다

translation.en: Ma'am, someone is turning the cannon into the kingdom.
translation.ko: 단장님, 누가 캐넌을 왕국으로 돌리고 있습니다

translation.en: Yes, I know. I gave the order.
But firing them will take out half the city.
The fact that everyone in this kingdom wants to run a sword through my heart…
translation.ko: 왕국의 모두가 날 죽이려 한다는 거?

translation.en: It's fooling you. Fooling all of you!
translation.ko: 널 속이는 거야 모두 속은 거야!

translation.en: Can't you see this is what it wants? For us to let our guard down!
translation.ko: 우리 경계심을 늦추려는 게 안 보여?

translation.en: I see what it really is, and so did Gloreth!
translation.ko: 난 저게 뭔지 알아 글로레스도 그랬고!

translation.en: That monster is a threat to our very way of life!
translation.ko: 저 괴물은 우리 삶에 위협적인 존재야!

translation.en: What if we've always been wrong?
Be right back. I'm gonna go break some stuff.
translation.ko: 금방 올게 뭐 좀 때려 부수고

translation.en: -Wait, Nimona. What are you-- -It's time to rewrite this story.
translation.ko: - 잠깐, 니모나, 너… - 이야기를 다시 쓸 때야

translation.en: Go back to the shadows from whence you came!
[Ballister] Some of us don't get the happily ever after we were looking for.
Maybe it's not that kind of kingdom.
Or maybe it's not the end of the story.
translation.ko: 이 이야기의 끝이 그게 아닐지도 모르고

translation.en: ♪ Future on my mind ♪ ♪ I'm leavin' the past behind ♪
